alert.note: Alert for Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 1:49AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
